title.english: The Sound of the Spinning Wheel

commentary: Invoking a sense of sadness and loss.
footnotes: [1] 'Eid wala chann' or 'Crescent moon of Eid' is a common Punjabi allegory for happiness.
lyrics: sun charkhe di mithi mithi kook
Listening to the sweet, sweet, sound of my spinning wheel:
mahiya mainu yaad aawanda
Memories of you, my Beloved, come to my mind.
meri dil vicho udthi-e hook
From within my heart, a call rises.
mahiya mainu yaad aawanda
Memories of you, my Beloved, come to my mind.
meri eid wala chann kadon chadega
When will the crescent moon of my Eid rise? [1]
allah janay mahi kadon vede vadega
Only God knows when my Beloved shall enter the courtyard.
dukh dhaday ne te zindgi malook
My pains are profound, and my life is delicate.
sun charkhe di mithi mithi kook

mahiya mainu yaad aawanda
Memories of you, my Beloved, come to my mind.
mahi aavega te khushiyan manavangi
When my Beloved approaches, I shall commemorate with happiness.
oday raha vich akhiyan vichawangi
Upon his path, I shall lay out my gaze.
jaan chadi hai vichhoryan ne fook
This departure has left my life charred.

kaali raat wali dange mainu shook
The grip of this dark night stings me so.
